summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.7°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 771 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1469 m), feels like temperature (up 5.7°C), outside temperature (up 4.0°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 770.9m lower than yesterday, 591.0m lower than the past week, 1468.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 745m and a high of 3580m, averaging 1215.5m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
